metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4274 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL Server 5.5.38 and earlier and5.6.19 and earlier allows local users to affect confidentiality, integrity,and availability via vectors related to SERVER:MyISAM.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadbclient18 - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-client - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-client-5.5 - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-client-core-5.5 - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-common - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-server - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-server-5.5 - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-server-core-5.5 - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-test - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-test-5.5 - 5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

libmysqlclient18 - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
libmysqld-pic - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-5.5 - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.5 - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-common - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-5.5 - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.5 - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-source-5.5 - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.5 - 5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

mysql-client-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-common-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-source-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mariadb-5.5 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.39-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
mysql-5.5 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.40-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
mysql-5.6 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
